bibl.title: A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume IV. Macedonia, Thrace, Northern Regions of the Black Sea. Edited by Peter Marshall FRASER and Elaine MATTHEWS with the assistance of Richard W.V. CATLING and the collaboration of many scholars.
